item.title: Hugo Plus Github Equals to Hello World
item.description: Objetive I want to publish some content on my blog using some content generator, and I don’t want to hire a hosting. I can use Wordpress, but I prefere to use some tecnlogies that let me know new ways of publish content. So, I will use Hugo for this pourpose. There are a lot of tools like Jekyllrb, Ghost, Grav, Pelican and more alternatives. The last step will be setup Github actions.
